xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 02 June 2014
xwikidoc.content: <akats> has joined #phenotips 12:46 <sdumitriu1> Let's see... 12:47 <akats> sdumitriu: Do you want me to continue working on the spreadsheet export or do you want me to tackle other issues on my list first? 12:47 <sdumitriu1> OK, let's say that will work 12:47 <sdumitriu1> Export 15:05 <sdumitriu> has quit 15:05 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 15:53 <phenotips_guest_> has joined #phenotips 16:33 <phenotips_guest_> I'm having some trouble with the Solr admin interface. With a local server running, the page localhost:8080/solr loads, 16:33 <phenotips_guest_> but the center panel indefinitely displays "Loading...", and the chrome dev window shows http://localhost:8080/solr$%7BadminPath%7D?wt=json 404 (Not Found) 16:33 <sdumitriu> Why are you trying to use that page? 16:34 <sdumitriu> What are you trying to do? 16:34 <sdumitriu> (in the latest snapshot the solr application no longer exists) 16:34 <phenotips_guest_> I am exploring ways to query to data 16:34 <phenotips_guest_> the* data 16:35 <sdumitriu> You can open http://localhost:8080/solr/hpo/select?q=*:*&fl=id&rows=64 16:37 <sdumitriu> akats: Found the problem 16:52 <phenotips_guest_> Ah, thanks 16:53 <phenotips_guest_> When it comes to making general queries (e.g.: get the list of phenotypes associated with all individuals of a certain ethnicity), what is the best way to get this data? 16:54 <sdumitriu> Hm... 16:54 <sdumitriu> Currently, raw hql queries to the database 16:54 <sdumitriu> Which are not pretty to write... 16:54 <sdumitriu> What would be better is to update the patient-data-index module to properly index all the patient data 16:55 <sdumitriu> Currently it only stores symptoms 16:58 <sdumitriu> Once we have a full patient index in Solr, you could do all kinds of queries 16:58 <sdumitriu> Much easier 16:59 <sdumitriu> But now... I guess you'll have to ask me for help with the hql queries 17:04 <phenotips_guest_> Ok. Is there a file in which you've set up an hql interface? 17:04 <sdumitriu> No, just create a new document 17:04 <sdumitriu> There's no UI for that, just type some new name in the URL 17:05 <sdumitriu> For example: http://localhost:8080/bin/PhenoTips/QueryPatients 17:05 <phenotips_guest_> Ok 17:07 <mcupak> has quit 17:16 <phenotips_guest_> Is the idea to drop an xwiki query module in? 17:16 <sdumitriu> No, the module is in place 17:16 <sdumitriu> Here's an example query: 17:22 <sdumitriu> https://gist.github.com/sdumitriu/96b444003cb3f375fc50 17:23 <sdumitriu> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Query+Module 17:41 <phenotips_guest_> Thanks for showing me this. I suppose a csv export can then be added on top, too? 18:07 <sdumitriu1> Yes 18:11 <akats> sdumitriu: What is the problem? 18:14 <akats> Did you figure out what broke it? 18:16 <sdumitriu1> Yes 18:16 <sdumitriu1> See commits 19:03 <phenotips_guest_> has quit 22:30 <akats> has quit
